title: YouTube TV surround sound coming to Roku & Android/Google TV next, Apple TV still in progress
content:
Google’s cord-cutting service currently only offers 5.1 audio on two device classes. YouTube TV today gave an update on bringing 5.1 surround sound to more users.

more…

The post YouTube TV surround sound coming to Roku & Android/Google TV next, Apple TV still in progress appeared first on 9to5Mac.
